content: shoulder bag daisy full video © bunnyhood this is a perfect bag for summer and more very easy and beautiful shoulder bag can be made even with a long handle and become crossbody bag begginers also can make it easily i bet you will love this way to crochet the bag it is made with 5-6 mm polyester cord ⤵️ https //www etsy com/listing/772967327/crochet-rope-6-mm-macrame-cord-polyester for one bag you will need - 150 meters polyester cord 5-6 mm - 7 mm hook - scissors - lighter - accessories not necessary size bottom lenght ~31 cm 12 2 inches width ~8 cm 3 2 inches sides height ~ 25 cm 9 8 inches handle ~40 cm 15 8 inches - stretching ~5 cm 2 inches washing crochet item can be washed in a washing machine on 30-40°c gentle cycle do not tumble dry do not bleach do not iron or dry clean 7 mm hook you can order here ⤵️ https //www etsy com/listing/891231449/7-mm-hook-for-crocheting-crochet-hook ref=shop_home_active_4&crt=1 you can order visit my etsy shop for more bags ⤵️ https //www etsy com/shop/bunny visit my instagram ⤵️ https //www instagram com/bunnyhoodshop/
